price: 106. Zij zullen zeggen: “Onze Heer! Onze slechtheid (van onze nafs) heeft ons overwonnen en wij waren een dwalend volk.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat ʿalaynā shiq'watunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīna
